name: Mystery Gate
description:
Timmy is determined to become a powerful wizzer... um, wizard. With the help of his sister, her friends and you, he just might be able to do it before dinnertime.

Mystery Gate is hybrid board game/visual novel sort of thing. It's short, silly and, quite frankly, not much of a game. However, as a first effort, it's... well, still not that impressive. But it might be worth a chuckle or two.

When I wrote it, I had a few goals in mind:

  • Get some experience with Ren'Py and Python.
  • Actually finish it.
  • Figure out the whole mechanism for posting it on Itch.io to share it with you folks.
  • Hopefully, give some of you a moment or two of entertainment.
  • Wait for the inevitable abuse in the comments.

The first three are done. I guess we'll see about that last two.
